column1: Table 2-15:  Emissions of NOx, CO, NMVOCs, and SO2 (kt)
Note: Totals by gas may not sum due to independent rounding.

Source: (EPA 2023a) except for estimates from forest fires, grassland fires, and field burning of agricultural residues. Emission categories from EPA (2023a) are aggregated into sectors and categories reported under the Paris Agreement and the UNFCCC as shown in Table ES-3.
